title: (x) Rheumatoid Arthritus Cipsomtea Ezduzit - Univers UltraCond {Stephen, Mark S}
author: tao

comments.content: Heh, It's from a few (honest, only a few) years ago. It was taken at a photo shoot I art directed. The subject of the photo was late, or getting his make-up done, and I stood in so the photographer could check the lighting and kept the Polaroid. I thought it might make a good pic for Typophile, but when I cropped it, it struck me that it looks just like a publicity shot. So I autographed it. :-)
